block.p: Nancy Ellen Ross, a daughter of Marjorie and Mervin Ross of New York, was married in New York last evening to Andrew Mark Wayne, a son of Charlotte and Robert Wayne of Short Hills, N.J. Dr. Ronald B. Sobel, the senior rabbi at Congregation Emanu-El in New York, officiated at the University Club.
The bride, 31, is the assistant director of the au pair program at InterExchange, a nonprofit organization in New York. She graduated from Connecticut College.

Nancy Ellen Ross, a daughter of Marjorie and Mervin Ross of New York, was married in New York last evening to Andrew Mark Wayne, a son of Charlotte and Robert Wayne of Short Hills, N.J. Dr. Ronald B. Sobel, the senior rabbi at Congregation Emanu-El in New York, officiated at the University Club.
The bride, 31, is the assistant director of the au pair program at InterExchange, a nonprofit organization in New York. She graduated from Connecticut College.
The bridegroom, 29, is a senior financial consultant at Merrill Lynch & Company in New York. He graduated from the University of Wisconsin.
